mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruit_tb (company_id, recruit_title, recruit_detail, work_area_id, recruit_start_at, recruit_end_at) VALUES(#{companyId}, #{recruitTitle}, #{recruitDetail}, #{workAreaId}, #{recruitStartAt}, #{recruitEndAt})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.member_name FROM recruit_tb AS r JOIN member_tb AS m ON r.company_id=m.member_id WHERE r.recruit_start_at <= NOW() AND r.recruit_end_at >= NOW() ORDER BY recruit_id DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}
SELECT r.*, m.member_name FROM recruit_tb AS r JOIN member_tb AS m ON r.company_id=m.member_id ORDER BY recruit_id DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}
SELECT r.*, m.member_name FROM recruit_tb AS r JOIN member_tb AS m ON r.company_id=m.member_id WHERE r.work_area_id=#{workAreaId}
SELECT r.*, m.member_name FROM recruit_tb AS r JOIN member_tb AS m ON r.company_id=m.member_id WHERE recruit_title LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{keyword},'%') OR recruit_detail LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT COUNT(recruit_id) FROM recruit_tb WHERE (company_id=#{companyId} AND recruit_end_at >= NOW())
SELECT COUNT(recruit_id) FROM recruit_tb WHERE (company_id=#{companyId} AND recruit_end_at < NOW())
SELECT COUNT(apply_id) FROM apply_tb WHERE apply_result = '1' AND recruit_id IN (SELECT recruit_id FROM recruit_tb WHERE company_id = #{companyId})
SELECT COUNT(apply_id) FROM apply_tb WHERE recruit_id IN (SELECT recruit_id FROM recruit_tb WHERE company_id = #{companyId})

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recruit_tb WHERE recruit_start_at <= NOW() AND recruit_end_at >= NOW()) AS ongoingRecruits, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM apply_tb WHERE apply_id IN (SELECT recruit_id FROM recruit_tb WHERE recruit_start_at <= NOW() AND recruit_end_at >= NOW())) AS applyMembers;
SELECT r.*, m.member_name FROM recruit_tb AS r JOIN member_tb AS m ON r.company_id=m.member_id WHERE company_id = #{companyId}
SELECT r.*, m.member_name, i.img_location FROM recruit_tb AS r LEFT JOIN member_tb AS m ON r.company_id=m.member_id LEFT JOIN img_tb AS i ON m.member_id=i.member_id WHERE recruit_id = #{recruitId}
